notifications.title: APJAKTU - Time Table slot of M.Tech Supplementary Examinations (including Part -Time), September 2023 - Publishing of - reg.
notifications.description: The Time Table Slot of M.Tech Supplementary Examinations (including Part -Time),September 2023 is published herewith. The exam will be held from 9.30am - 12.30pm.

notifications.title: APJAKTU - Detailed Time Table of M.Tech S2 Regular Examination June 2023 (2022 scheme) (including Part - Time) - Notification - reg:
notifications.description:
The detailed Time Table of M.Tech S2 Regular Examination June 2023 (2022 scheme)
(including Part - Time) is published herewith. The exam will be held from 9.30 am to 12.00 pm (2
hours 30 minutes).

notifications.title: B.Des S2 Jury exam results - Result publication of jury course: DS102-DESIGN STUDIO II - Notified - Reg.
notifications.description:
It is hereby notified that the results of the jury course: DS102-DESIGN STUDIO II of B.Des S2
(R,S) Exam June 2023 are published. The detailed results are available under 'Results' tab of
the University website and in Student and College login.

notifications.title: Exam Registration opened for MCA Integrated S9 (R,S) Examination December 2023
notifications.description: It is hereby notified that the course/exam registration for MCA Integrated S9 (R,S) Examination December 2023 now open on the KTU portal:Detailed notification is attached herewith.

notifications.title: B.Des S6 (R,S) Exam May 2023--Revaluation
notifications.description: It is hereby notified that students can apply for  revaluation & answer script copy up to 16-09-2023(Saturday). Fee for answer script copy is Rs.525/- and fee for revaluation is Rs.630/- per answer script. Students can submit the request and pay the fee through student login only. (Fee payment through the college office will not be available.)

notifications.title: B.Des S4 (R,S) Exam May 2023--Revaluation

notifications.title: B Arch 2016 admitted students can submit the course duration extension requests through the KTU portal.
Result Published : MCA (Second Year Direct) S2 (S) Examination May/June 2023
notifications.description:
It is hereby notified that the result of MCA (Second Year Direct) S2 (S) Examination May/June 2023 is published. The detailed result is available under the 'Result' tab of the University website
and in student and college login.Candidates who desire to apply for the copy of answer scripts can register through the portal till 08.09.2023 by remitting a fee of ₹525 (Fee payment through college office will not be available). Late requests for answer scripts will not be allowed.

notifications.title: Result Published: M.Tech S2 (S) Examination April/May 2023, Ernakulam II cluster
notifications.description: It is hereby notified that the result of M.Tech S2 (S) Examination April/May 2023 , Ernakulam II cluster is published. The detailed result is available under the 'Result' tab of the University website and in student and college login.Candidates who desire to apply for the copy of answer scripts can register through the portal till 05.09.2023 (date applicable for both student and college) by remitting a fee of ₹525. Late requests for answer scripts will not be allowed.
